ticket.title: Is there any script for rails 2.3
ticket.original-body: Hi all I am new here I am looking for a script (rake file) which when executed can tell me which deprecated things I am using. There exist such a script for rails 2.2 Anybody knows whether there is such a script for rails 2.3 or not Thanks
ticket.latest-body: Hi all I am new here I am looking for a script (rake file) which when executed can tell me which deprecated things I am using. There exist such a script for rails 2.2 Anybody knows whether there is such a script for rails 2.3 or not Thanks
ticket.original-body-html:
Hi all
I am new here
I am looking for a script (rake file) which when executed can tell me which deprecated things I am using.
There exist such a script for rails 2.2
Anybody knows whether there is such a script for rails 2.3 or not
Thanks
